```{r, echo = FALSE}

sup_data <- read.csv("C:/Users/megan/Desktop/806_final/supp_data.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)

lake_data <- read.csv("C:/Users/megan/Desktop/806_final/lake_data.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)

```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}

database <- full_join(sup_data, lake_data)

```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
select(database, Lake, Layer, pH, Collection_Date) %>%
  group_by(Layer) %>%
  filter(Lake == "North Sparkling Bog", Layer != "NA", pH > 0, Collection_Date
  != "NA") %>% 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = Collection_Date, y = pH, color = Layer, 
  by = Layer)) + geom_point() + labs(color = "Layer", x = 
  "Collection_Date", y = "pH")

```
